utilities

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends Object
    This class encapsulates the robot systems.
    Author:
    fauzi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Robot(MyJoystick joytick) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getFeederStatus()
      Gets the feeder status, true means active.
      double getMotorLeft()
      Returns the speed of the left motor.
      double getMotorRight()
      Returns the speed of the right motor.
      boolean getRetrieveStatus()
      Gets the retrieve status, true means on.
      double getShooterSpeed()
      Get the speed of the shooter.
      void run()
      Runs the robot code, as in Drive, Shooter.
      void setDriveSpeed(double dLeft, double dRight)
      Set the speed of the left and right motors, values allowed are -1 to 1.
      void setFeeder(boolean bStatus)
      Sets the feeder to true or false.
      void setRetrieve(boolean bStatus)
      Sets the retriever, true means active.
      void setShooter(double dSpeed)
      Sets the shooter to the specified speed.
      void stopRobot()
      Stops the robot and sets everything to false or zero, does not disable the ability to use it though.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
